author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Sybil Defense DAO
description: Sybil-resistant anonymous authentication is a common challenge for DAOs however there are no open source solutions or services on Cardano.
solution: Create a DAO to develop secure, open source Sybil-resistant anonymous authentication solutions for DAO Net and other DAOs.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
